content.raw:
It has been in my list for some time. I like the idea. My very early tests, months ago, showed that we probably need to patch the current code to be able to compile with ```c++1``` support.

A starting point about the issues of mixing ```c++11``` and ```c++98``` object code can be found at: http://gcc.gnu.org/wiki/Cxx11AbiCompatibility
content.html:
It has been in my list for some time. I like the idea. My very early tests, months ago, showed that we probably need to patch the current code to be able to compile with c++1 support.

A starting point about the issues of mixing c++11 and c++98 object code can be found at: http://gcc.gnu.org/wiki/Cxx11AbiCompatibility
